item.title: Installation
item.description: This chapter describes how to set up the artemis environment for the CRIB experiment.

item.title: Setting
item.description: This chapter describes how to prepare the configuration file for the experiment. If you have already some CRIB artemis environment, please see from here for initial settings.

item.title: CRIB Configuration
item.description: Artemis configuration varies from experiment to experiment. We would like to explain in this chapter how they are configured and used in CRIB experiment.

item.title: Example
item.description: Up to now, we have introduced the installation and concepts of artemis. This chapter will show you how to analyse with artemis through practical examples; if you want to know how to use artemis, it is no problem to start reading from here.

item.title: Q&A
item.description: Cannot be analysed in online mode… When you start the event loop in online mode and artemis gets stuck, babian may not have been activated. There is a shellscript to run the “babian” in cribana PC.
